name: Void Hook
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme "Joined Together".

Who doesn't love grappling hooks?  In this game, you always move forwards, but you can change your direction with a grappling hook. You have to collect energy (this game's version of health), and ram into enemies to get points. You lose energy when you do that though, so be careful!
